## Statistiques descriptives

# Comparaison hommes/femmes

```{r sexism}
data <- read.csv(file = "DB_binome_2.csv")
n = nrow(data)

print(data[1, ])

for(i in seq(1))
{
  print(data[i, ])
}

```

## Distribution de la pêche en fonction de la tranche d'âge

```{r}
tranches = c(0, 0, 0)
for (i in seq(1, n)) {
    tranche = data[i, "Age"]
    tranches[tranche - 1] = tranches[tranche - 1] + data[i, "Peche"]
}
barplot(tranches)
```

## Intensité du vent

```{r}
vent = c()
for(i in seq(1, n))
{
  vent = c(vent, data[i, "Noeuds"])
}
hist(vent)
```
